description: [menuPass](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0045) has used RDP connections to move across the victim network.(Citation: PWC Cloud Hopper April 2017)(Citation: District Court of NY APT10 Indictment December 2018)

external_references.description: PwC and BAE Systems. (2017, April). Operation Cloud Hopper. Retrieved April 5, 2017.
